title: How to Ollie on a Tech Deck Using Three Fingers

steps.title: Place your index finger right behind the front screws.
steps.content: Place your index finger right behind the front screws.

steps.title: Place your middle finger right behind the Tech Deck logo.
steps.content: Place your middle finger right behind the Tech Deck logo.

steps.title: Place your ring finger on the back of the board.
steps.content: Place your ring finger on the back of the board.

steps.title: Smack down the tail of the board and at the same time try to move the board forward while keeping your fingers on the board.
steps.content: Smack down the tail of the board and at the same time try to move the board forward while keeping your fingers on the board.

steps.title: Land the board while still coming forward.
steps.content: Land the board while still coming forward.

steps.title: Ride away looking cool while your friends stare in awe.
steps.content: Ride away looking cool while your friends stare in awe.
